did.unittitle: International Typographical Union Local 62 (Utica, NY) Minute Book, 1918-1925
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Meeting minutes of International Typographical Union, Local 62 from 1918 to 1925.

bioghist.p: Local 62 of the International Typographical Union was based in Utica, New York.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of one bound volume containing meeting minutes of International Typographical Union, Local 62 from 1918 to 1925.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: International Typographical Union Local 62 (Utica, NY) Minute Book #5811. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: 5278: Utica Trades Assembly Records 5288: International Brotherhood Pulp, Sulphite, Paper Mill Workers, Local 670 (Utica, NY) Minute Book
